page.title: 16Lawshall Parish Newsletter
page.content: Extracts from the monthly Parish Newsletter July 1985. Lawshall Mother's Union-members attended a fete held in the Archdeacon's garden. It was a won- derful opportunity to meet and make friends with other members of the Sudbury Deanery. Tramp's Supper on Saturday 10th August at 8pm in the Village Hall.Tickets 250p which includes a Chicken & Chips Supper Prize for the Best Tramp! The Topiary Art displayed in Harry's garden which has given so much pleasure to children and visitors to Lawshall Village, has been vandalised. What a challange it would be to carry out vandalism during the hours of daylight with the chance of getting caught! But being COWARDS, vandals only do their devastating deeds under the cover of darkness!
